Categorize from predefined list.description: The user wants to set the category of the transaction from the predefined categories.
input: click on 'View All Transactions' button or double click on a \\ specific bank account from the Account List view
select the desired transaction to be categorized.
press on the category option and choose the appropriate category \\ from the drop down menu.
output: The transaction's category is set to the one chosen by the user.

Create a new category.description: The user wants to create a category for the transaction.
input: click on 'View All Transactions' button or double click on a \\ specific bank account from the Account List view
select the desired transaction to be categorized.
press on the category option and type in the new category.
output: The transaction's category is set to the one created by the user.

Category created is too long..description: The user wants to create a category for the transaction.
input: click on 'View All Transactions' button or double click on a specific \\ bank account from the Account List view
select the desired transaction to be categorized.
press on the category option and type in the new category which is \\ longer than allowed.
output: The transaction's category is not set because the category entered \\ is too long.
